```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
# Set seed
set.seed(33993)

# Simulate data for 10,000 trials
trial_data <- data.frame(
  image_cat = rbinom(10000, 1, 0.08)  # Simulate cat images with 8% probability
)

# Set probabilities
trial_data <- trial_data |>
  mutate(
    identified_as_cat = case_when(
      image_cat == 1 ~ rbinom(10000, 1, 0.8) == 1,  
      image_cat == 0 ~ rbinom(10000, 1, 0.5) == 1
    )
  )

# # Posterior probability of correctly identified cat images
mean(trial_data$image_cat[trial_data$identified_as_cat] == 1)
```
